head.title: Metro Briefing | New Jersey: New Brunswick: Teacher Guilty Of Sex With Student

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New Jersey: New Brunswick: Teacher Guilty Of Sex With Student

body.head.byline: By TINA KELLEY; Compiled by John Sullivan

abstract.p: Gym teacher Amy Burke pleads guilty to having sex with 13-year-old male student at Perth Amboy, NJ, school (S)

block.p: A gym teacher in Perth Amboy pleaded guilty yesterday in State Superior Court to endangering the welfare of a child and official misconduct for having a sexual relationship with a 13-year-old male student, prosecutors said. The teacher, Amy Burke, 32, of Carteret, who had worked at McGinnis Middle School in Perth Amboy since 1999, faces four years in jail at her sentencing in March, said Bruce J. Kaplan, the Middlesex County prosecutor. Ms. Burke, who was also a cheerleading coach, was suspended after her arrest. As part of her plea, she will surrender her teaching certificates.
